abstract: Evangelos "Vangelis" Moras (Greek: Βαγγέλης Μόρας; born 26 August 1981) is a Greek footballer who plays as a centre back for Serie A club Hellas Verona.
comment: Evangelos "Vangelis" Moras (Greek: Βαγγέλης Μόρας; born 26 August 1981) is a Greek footballer who plays as a centre back for Serie A club Hellas Verona.
